Good raised garden beds for the gardenHappy with these great garden beds.  They look great in the garden and I have been happy with all the salad and greens that have grown well in them.  They are fiddly to assemble with all the screws but once you do the first one, the others are quicker.  I have had colourbond raised beds before that seemed to be a bit sturdier but overall these are okay for the garden.  I would have preferred longer panels for the 2 metre plus beds as I found by assembling the smaller panels, they seemed to buckle a little in the middle.  This was only the case on the 2.5 metre plus bed.Date of experience: October 14, 2022

One week back i ordered 3 rugs from‚Ä¶One week back i ordered 3 rugs from VidaXL, they couldnt give me exact delivery date after contacting them 3 times, the items still did come in time they stated 5-7 days.But now the shock!!The rugs were missing fibers all across the lines where they were bent into packaging, all 3 rugs. And they asked a lot of money for this rugs, but the quality is cheap Chinese fiber, no quality control, poor customer service.This is the 2nd time i order from them, the last time i didnt bother when i ordered 2 office chairs and 2 screws were missing, i took the screews from my older chairs.But this is unacceptable, i cant even use the rugs, going straight to the trash. Im waiting for a contact from them and a full refund.I would add pictures if i could, they look like they have been used for 10 years and the fabric started to fall off.Date of experience: June 04, 2024

Bad quality products, do not buyThe cabinet I ordered looked really well on the website, and I was pleased with quick delivery.Sadly, the product did not meet the expected minimum quality standard. The wooden planks had some black smudges that can not be cleaned, they were negligently made, the veneer placement was askew, the holes for dowels had different diameters.After the assembly the whole cabinet was wobbly and the main planks were not parallel to eachother.The biggest dissappointment was the design of the back of the cabinet, made from three cardboard pieces, with two visible connections. I would suggest a redesign, for the back to be made from two pieces, conncting on the back of the middle shelf. I am overall very disappointed. If I knew what I would get for this money, I definitely wouldn‚Äôt buy it.Date of experience: September 18, 2023

Bad product quality and even worse overall service.I have ordered a dining table, a bench and a pair of dining chairs. After about 1 week, I received the bench and the table, and a small inflatable boat, which I thought at first, was a ''bonus gift''. It was not, since I have received no chairs.It took me about a month of nagging with customer support, to tell them that they have sent the wrong item (PS: The customer support did barely understand what I was saying, probably using Google translate, and they have switched agents for almost every reply I got). After 1 month of emailing back and forth, they apparently understood the problem, and after a week, I finally received my package, only to find another bench inside, instead of the chairs. It then took another month to get them to understand what they did wrong, and only then, after 2 months and 30+ emails written, and an army of CS agents, they have finally sent me the right package.This experience has left me deeply dissatisfied with their service.+ the quality is bad, it doesn't match the price at all.Date of experience: May 25, 2023
Recommendable shopFast delivery. Product as described! Can recommend the shop.Date of experience: August 29, 2024

Nice design, but awful instructions + bad quality of the boardsThe design of the bed is good looking. But putting this together is another story. The bed comes with instructions that doesn't have correct display of what holes on the black wooden boards, that you get. They aren't numbered and look quite the same. So you can really relay on the instructions to put the boards together.So when you figure that out, you realise after 5 hours that actually you got the map of 1 bed and 1 additional piece, that makes the design pretty. So in any case you get a lot of extra parts.So if you started with the first map and assembled the whole bed, you have to reassemble everything again becouse that additional part comes instead of the pieces of first map, which remain at the end...Anyway, this seems like a joke and if it wouldn't be such a problem reasseblme that all and send back i would return it, becouse also the boards are not painted well, are damaged and a few of them are also a little too short...So maybe at lease give the costumers the accurate instructions with pictures that display everything as it should be. We were putting it together for 6 hours with 2 men that works in handy jobs...Date of experience: March 01, 2024

How can you send the same WRONG item 2 times in a row!I am absolutely enraged and deeply disappointed with the abysmal service I have received from VidaXL. Not only did they manage to send me the wrong item once, but they had the audacity to repeat the mistake for the second time on the same order! It is beyond comprehension how a company can exhibit such a staggering level of incompetence and carelessness.The sheer amount of time and effort wasted in dealing with VidaXL's consistent errors is mind-boggling. First, I had to spend precious time contacting their customer support, explaining the situation, and initiating a return. I thought this would be the end of my ordeal, but little did I know that VidaXL had other plans to test my patience.When I finally received the replacement item, my hopes were quickly dashed as it turned out to be yet another incorrect product. It is astonishing how a company can repeatedly fail at fulfilling a simple order, especially after they were made fully aware of the mistake they made previously.As a result of VidaXL's gross negligence, not only did I have to invest additional time and energy in returning the wrong items, but I also had to endure the disappointment and frustration of not receiving what I had initially ordered. The level of inconvenience and inconvenience caused is simply unforgivable.Furthermore, the fact that this happened twice for the same order is indicative of systemic flaws within VidaXL's operations. It raises serious questions about their quality control, attention to detail, and overall reliability as an online retailer. Customers should be able to trust that the products they order will be delivered correctly, without the need for repeated interventions and time-consuming returns.Needless to say, I will never be making another purchase from VidaXL, and I strongly caution others to steer clear of this company. Their inability to fulfill even the simplest of orders accurately and their blatant disregard for customer satisfaction are utterly unacceptable.In conclusion, VidaXL's consistent delivery of wrong items, not once but twice for the same order, has left me feeling frustrated, inconvenienced, and utterly dissatisfied. Their inability to rectify their mistakes and their lack of regard for their customers' time and trust is appalling. Save yourself the headache and avoid VidaXL at all costs.Date of experience: May 07, 2023
